title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the neural interface-based assistant, including its intended functionality, target users, integration with existing systems, performance requirements, security considerations, and any other relevant constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall architecture and design of the system, including the neural interface, task coordination engine, and integration with other components.

title: Implement Neural Interface
description: Develop the neural interface component responsible for interpreting brain signals and translating them into commands or actions.

title: Develop Task Coordination Engine
description: Implement the task coordination engine that orchestrates and manages tasks based on the input from the neural interface and other sources.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the assistant, allowing users to interact with the system and monitor task progress.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Develop interfaces and adapters to integrate the assistant with existing workplace systems, such as project management tools, communication platforms, and data sources.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the system by implementing appropriate measures, such as authentication, authorization, data encryption, and secure communication protocols.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the quality and reliability of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare documentation for the system, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.
